name: Katalic
tag_list: internet-marketing-ventura-county, web-marketing-in-ventura, web-design-in-ventura-county, iphone-application-in-ventura-county, internet-marketing-thousand-oaks, internet-marketing-camarillo, internet-marketing-santa-barbara, search-engine-optimization,
overview:
Katalic is a digital marketing agency focused on analyzing, developing and maintaining internet marketing strategies for professional practices and small businesses. We merge the gap between technology and user needs to fulfill business objectives. ​ With over 5 years of experience in digital strategy and execution, we calibrate your business goals with digital marketing to create engaging customer experiences and increase your online presence. The bottom line is that we care about your return on investment (ROI). ​ Based in Ventura County, Katalic approaches innovation and business differentiation unconventionally.

What we do ​​We are a digital marketing and web analytics agency dedicated to developing and executing digital marketing strategies for small businesses and professional practices. ​ What we embrace We embrace the fields of consumer behavior, market research, industry trends, internet marketing, semantic analysis, coding and architectural technology, augmented reality and interactive design to differentiate businesses from competitors. This is what we call Convergent Marketing. ﻿ What we study We continue studying and researching methods and applications for driven results. We love data and would like to tell you the story behind yours. ﻿ ​​We are philanthropic We help non-profit organizations build visibility in their community free of cost.

We value our client’s brand The name of your business or practice can be a brand, even if you do not consider it branded. We value this name, as it will evoke an emotion and a reaction to your business. Our goal is expose your brand ethically with the best practices online.​ We maintain realistic goals for our clients ﻿​ ​We maintain realistic goals for our clients We will never promise that your website will become the most trafficked, but we will work to increase search engine visibility and improve the design. ﻿ We help you understand Return on Investment (ROI) We will never send you a report of your website with just numbers. We will chat with you and review data to continue strategizing, adapting and changing to best suit your needs.﻿ ​ ​​We work as a team with you We are committed to working in unison to achieve results, and we believe communication is key for a well-executed digital marketing campaign.
